arts.ttl: Genoa chase first win against Cremonese
arts.sum: Their last meeting in Genoa came on 15 November 1998 in Serie B, when Gigi Cagni`s Grifone thrashed Giampiero Marini`s Cremonese 4-1. Genoa welcome Cremonese to Marassi as they hunt for their first win of the season and a way out of last place.

Two of the poorest teams in form meet on Tuesday night hoping to end their dismal run. Genoa's 2-1 defeat to Torino at the weekend was their third defeat in their last four games. They have only won ...

arts.ttl: Genoa vs. Cremonese - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Serie A clash between Genoa and Cremonese, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
